channel.title: ::kill?
channel.description:
can anyone plz plz plz!" tell me how to add the ::kill command on my 508 hd server? its source is epeson
tx 4 reading

item.title: ::kill?
item.dc:creator: @r_r_r r r r
item.description:
@r_r_r wrote:

[quote=“Darkning, post:2, topic:261100”][code]
if (command.startsWith(“kill”) && playerRights == 3) {
String nam = command.substring(5);
client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)];

        victim.ApplyDead();
        victim.sendMessage("You have been killed by " + playerName + "!");
        setAnimation(829);
    }[/code]

try that, just change it to your animation code and your applydead methods and everything.[/quote]
I tryed that code in a 317 and it didnt work. Any thoughts why?

Read full topic
